name: JavaNames_toJavaNamesTest
description: Unit tests for the JavaNames.toJavaNames method, which converts names to Java-style names.

test_cases.name: testToJavaNames_NullInput
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the toJavaNames method when the input is null.

test_cases.name: testToJavaNames_EmptyInput
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the toJavaNames method when the input is an empty string.

test_cases.name: testToJavaNames_MethodCase
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of a snake_case string to a method-style Java name.

test_cases.name: testToJavaNames_NonMethodCase
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of a snake_case string to a non-method-style Java name.

test_cases.name: testToJavaNames_MixedCase
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of a mixed-case snake_case string to both method-style and non-method-style Java names.
